scripts.test-db: node -e "const { checkDatabaseHealth } = require('./database'); checkDatabaseHealth((err, results) => { console.log('Database Health:', results); process.exit(0); });"
scripts.db-health: node -e "const db = require('./database-config'); db.checkDatabaseHealth((err, results) => { console.log('Database Health:', results); process.exit(0); });"
